name: WooCommerce Priority Order
author: Syntac Studio

sections.description: WooCommerce Priority Order is extension for WooCommerce useful for mark customer orders as priority, sometimes we need mark the orders to differentiate which the order is priority.
sections.installation:
1. Upload priority-order folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now you can use button “Priority” at the admin orders page
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Release first version

1.0.1

  • Update readme
  • Add icon and Screenshots
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload priority-order folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now you can use button “Priority” at the admin orders page
